title: [Blighted Forest, Stream Bank]
description: Blocked by a thick field of cattails, the trail disappears.   Beyond the cattails lies a clear, moonlit lake.  The path's vantage point offers an excellent view of the merger of river current into the peaceful embrace of the lake's expanse.

Blocked by a thick field of cattails, the trail disappears.   Beyond the cattails lies a clear, crystal blue lake.  The path's vantage point offers an excellent view of the merger of river current into the peaceful embrace of the lake's expanse.
